title: Game Times fror friends
body:
I don't know if this is happening to everyone else, but all of the times that it says my friends are in game for is over the 500 minutes which doesn't seem right unless they have been on all night. If anyone else has this problem please support this post so we can get this fixed to make Alpha better.
Thanks, PulseKing

replies.body:
This bug has been around for a while now, it also happens in the Legacy client. For me, it doesn't occur for everyone that I hover over in my Friend List.

{{champion:17}}
